description.zh: 包含标题、内容、操作区域。
description.en: A basic card containing a title, content and an extra corner content.

description.zh: 在灰色背景上使用无边框的卡片。
description.en: A borderless card on a gray background.
A simple card only containing a content area.

description.zh: 可以利用 `Card.Meta` 支持更灵活的内容。
description.en: You can use `Card.Meta` to support more flexible content.

description.zh: 在系统概览页面常常和栅格进行配合。
description.en: Cards usually cooperate with grid column layout in overview page.

examples.source:
import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; import { Card, Col, Row } from 'choerodon-ui'; ReactDOM.render(
Card content Card content Card content
, document.getElementById('container'));

description.zh: 数据读入前会有文本块样式。
description.en: Shows a loading indicator while the contents of the card is being fetched.

description.zh: 一种常见的卡片内容区隔模式。
可以放在普通卡片内部，展示多层级结构的信息。
description.en: It can be placed inside the ordinary card to display the information of the multilevel structure.

description.zh: 一种支持封面、头像、标题和描述信息的卡片。

node.html:
<Card title="Card title">Card content</Card>

Card

Property Description Type Default
actions The action list, shows at the bottom of the Card. Array -
bodyStyle Inline style to apply to the card content object -
bordered Toggles rendering of the border around the card boolean true
cover Card cover ReactNode -
extra Content to render in the top-right corner of the card string|ReactNode -
hoverable Lift up when hovering card boolean false
loading Shows a loading indicator while the contents of the card are being fetched boolean false
tabList List of TabPane's head. Array<{key: string, tab: ReactNode}> -
activeTabKey Current TabPane's key string -
defaultActiveTabKey Initial active TabPane's key, if activeTabKey is not set. string -
title Card title string|ReactNode -
type Card style type, can be set to inner or not set string -
onTabChange Callback when tab is switched (key) => void -
onHeadClick Callback while Click Card head React.MouseEventHandler -

Card.Grid

Property Description Type Default
className className of container string -
style style object of container object -

Card.Meta

Property Description Type Default
avatar avatar or icon ReactNode -
className className of container string -
description description content ReactNode -
style style object of container object -
title title content ReactNode -

pageContext.description:
Simple rectangular container.

When To Use

A card can be used to display content related to a single subject. The content can consist of multiple elements of varying types and sizes.
